definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]

sentences.english: Because of tone change and effect of Ningyuan Guanhua, entering tone continues to evolve.
sentences.chinese: 入聲通過連讀變調，官話的影響繼續演變。

sentences.english: We also have an example of consonant to vowel linking in the phrase, can you hear it?
sentences.chinese: 這裏也出現了由輔音和元音形成的連讀，能聽出來嗎？

sentences.english: I learned how each sound was linked to another.
sentences.chinese: 我學到了每個單詞間如何連讀。

sentences.english: He is quite ignorant, he can't even read or write.
sentences.chinese: 他很無知，他甚至連讀或寫都不會。

sentences.english: Accent is a combinatoin of three main components, intonation, liaisons and pronunciation.
sentences.chinese: 口音包括三個主要的組成部分，語調，連讀和發音。

sentences.english: There emerged 36 kinds of intonation patterns of sound cluster of double characters group in Qishan dialect.
sentences.chinese: 岐山方言語音中兩字組連讀共產生了36種連讀調式。

sentences.english: There emerged 36 kinds of intonation patterns of sound cluster of double characters group in Qishan dialect.
sentences.chinese: 岐山方言語音中兩字組連讀共產生了36種連讀調式。

sentences.english: Tone sandhi is considered as a common phonetic phenomena in Chinese dialect.
sentences.chinese: 連讀變調是漢語方言中一種普遍的語音現象。

sentences.english: The tone sandhi of disyllabic word and the neutral tone.
sentences.chinese: 描寫莒南方言兩字組連讀變調及輕聲的變調。

sentences.english: IGNORANT】He is quite ignorant, he can't even read or write.
sentences.chinese: 他很無知，他甚至連讀或寫都不會。

sentences.english: First, it is the evaluation model of liaison in spoken English.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先給出了英語口語發音中連讀的評估模型。

sentences.english: The American has very many LianDu.
